body.name: AROEVE Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Up to 1095 Sq Ft Air Cleaner Coverage CADR 220m³/h H13 True HEPA Remove 99.9% of Dust, Pet Dander, Pollen for Office, Bedroom, MK03- Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 2 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 47 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 47 mins
features: H13 Purification Efficiency: AROEVE air purifier features a detachable and washable grille, and a HEPA filter with pre-filter, HEPA, and activated carbon layers. It effectively filters 99.9% of particles as small as 0.3 microns in the air, including dust, smoke, pollen, hair, and more. With a 1095 Sq Ft expansion area, it helps protect your family's health by providing cleaner and fresher air.

Extreme Purification: With a 360° circular air inlet design, pollutants have nowhere to hide. The new spiral air outlet adapts to wind direction and reduces airflow resistance, increasing air volume and performance by 8% compared to the old straight-out grille, while optimizing noise by 7%. Breathe easy and enjoy a cleaner, quieter environment.

Unique Product Design: The suspended and detachable design adds a modernist touch to the air purifier. The transparent central body with added light creates a hovering effect. The detachable body design makes it easy to clean, simply unscrew the bottom to rinse.

Boosted Power for Greater Air Flow: With a bio-inspired inclined tongue design and a triple shock and noise reduction multi-wing fan, this air purifier boasts strong and efficient power to quickly and quietly reduce harmful particles from the air, promoting clean air to rapidly spread throughout the whole area.

Quiet and Restful Nights: With multi-dimensional noise reduction processing, this air purifier operates quietly. When switched to sleep mode, it produces noise as low as 24dB(A), ensuring a peaceful sleep until dawn. (Reminder: The air purifier is equipped with a 2000-hour cartridge replacement reminder. Replace the filter cartridge every 3-6 months for optimal performance.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and Quite
reviews.reviewText: This runs great while also not being too loud. I am able to sleep with it on level 1. Crisp fresh air has never smelled better. The item was super easy to set up when taking it out of the box. Quality is superb!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great white noise
reviews.reviewText: This is great. It’s quiet, yet provides a nice sound. Works great, air is cleaner and less dust in my home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this air purifier. It seems to be working well. My only issue is that there were some scratches on it upon arrival (I actually thought it was used, but I'm pretty sure it wasn't). Would have had it replaced but it slipped my mind. Oh well, it still works fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use in office
reviews.reviewText: So, I got this cleaner on Sunday and was surprised on how easy it was to set up. I am not sure the description is correct as it says it cleans a very large room and this thing is very small, but we will see. Twist the two cylinders take out the packaged filter place back in and twist back together. I work in a hospital and have a large office. I sat this up on Monday and put it on the #2 setting and left it running all day and overnight. The #2 setting was very quiet and did not bother me at all. The high setting was pretty loud, but I just turned it down. When I walked into my office this morning the smell was fantastic. The air felt cleaner, the dust had seemed to dissipate, and I was very relieved on how well the room smelled. I think this will be a good unit if it last very long. I did go this afternoon and look for replacement filter, but they seemed to have disappeared. Overall, in the short time I have had this I give it 5 stars. The only issue is it says 2000 lifetime and I am concerned that it will make you buy a new filter at 200 hours, but we will see. For the price you can't beat this machine.1 question is the blue light functional or just a pretty thing?ps. I did buy the Amazon extended warranty as I couldn't find a manufactures warranty. Will update if anything goes wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have two Great Danes in an 890 sq ft apartment. It can start to smell stale easily. This air purifier works perfectly to remove this issue. Air smells fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quiet, works great, blue light provides just enough of a "night light" effect in the evening. Great value and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its really quite for the bedroom - better sleep now
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of dust here in Florida and in my house and with two dogs its not easy having a good air quality in the house - especially in the hot summer time - i have my lanai doors most of the day time open cause of my dogs and cause i dont like to have no fresh air in the house. With this Air Purifier i have now a really good air quality in my house. No "bad" smell of standing air anymore. I bought a second one for my bedroom and what should i say - its really quite i have a very light sleep but i can sleep and i feel really better, can better breath and have a better sleep in my opinion. 10 stars from me and i love that this one is for large rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my living room
reviews.reviewText: It has a timer which is great and 3 different fan speeds.
